review: I thought this was going to be a good replacement for a Roku stick, but after using it a while, I'm noticing there is a lot of buffering going on. I have it connected via Cat-5, so there shouldn't be any transmission issues as none are evident when I use the Blu Ray player which is also connect via the same switch. It's great when it works well, but there are occasions when it doesn't. Disappointed.

review: I've completely ditched the SEVEN AppleTV devices I have installed ... which is pretty major for someone who only uses Apple hardware (iMac's, MacBooks, iPhone, etc.).  The Fire TV is MUCH faster with a significantly better user experience than both AppleTV and Roku.  The remote is bluetooth and much more comfortable to operate than the aluminum AppleTV and plastic Roku remotes.  The device itself is super responsive.  Add in a Prime membership, Netflix, and the Plex app, and you'll never look back to cable.  I've actually pre-ordered multiple Fire TV STICK devices because of this unit... as well as buying more Fire TV units.
